column4: var dicelist = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available() && mydice.basevalue != d){ dicelist.push(mydice); } } if(dicelist.length > 0) { shuffle(dicelist); var sploot = split(dicelist[0].basevalue); dicelist[0].animatereroll(sploot[0]| self.screenposition()); givedice(sploot[1]);}

column2: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;]|get a new dice|[gray](<evar:fetusdeletus> out of 3 times used)[]
column4: e.setvar(~fetusdeletus~ | e.getvar(~fetusdeletus~) + 1); var fetusdeletus = e.getvar(~fetusdeletus~); attack(d); givedice(); if(self.layout == ~DECK~ && e.getvar(~fetusdeletus~) == 3) { var deleteindex = -1; for(i in 0...Deck.getcards(~all~).length) if(Deck.getcards(~all~)[i].equipment == e) { deleteindex = i; break; } Deck.getcards(~all~)[deleteindex].delete(); }

column2: The R Key|Wipe your deck|and start clean
column4: inflictself(~extraturn~); runscript(~diceydungeons/cfbresetkey~); for(i in 0...Deck.getcards(~all~).length) {Deck.getcards(~all~)[i].delete();} trace(self.getvar(~packstogive~)); if(self.getvar(~doubledecker~) != ~yep~){addjestercard(self.getvar(~packstogive~));} else{for (x in self.getvar(~packstogive~)){addjestercard(x);}} self.endturnnow();
